body.name: ViewSonic VX2467-MHD 24 Inch 1080p Gaming Monitor with 75Hz, 1ms, Ultra-Thin Bezels, FreeSync, Eye Care, HDMI, VGA, and DP, Black
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by ViewSonic Corporation.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 4 mins
features: SEE THE DIFFERENCE: 24 Inch Full HD (1920x1080p) MVA gaming monitor with thin bezels
GAME ON: 75Hz refresh rate and 1ms (MPRT) response time for fast gaming
ULTRA-SMOOTH GAMING: AMD FreeSync technology enables fluid and tear-free gameplay
ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT: Flicker-Free technology and Blue Light Filter for reduced eye fatigue
GAME ON: An arsenal of pre-set customizable visual modes keeps you ready for any FPS, RTS, or MOBA games
body.description: The ViewSonic® VX2467-mhd is a 24” (23.8” viewable) Full HD price-performance monitor built for gaming and entertainment. Equipped with AMD FreeSync, this monitor’s variable refresh rate capabilities virtually eliminate screen tearing and stuttering for fluid game play during fast-paced action scenes. An ultra-fast 1ms response time (MPRT) provides smooth screen performance free from blurring or ghosting. For a game-winning competitive edge, a Game Mode hot key optimizes gameplay for FPS, RTS and MOBA. On top of that, a black stabilization function helps you target enemies lurking in the dark, while enabling the monitor to maintain brilliantly rich colors and contrast for total immersion. Flexible connectivity options such as DisplayPort, HDMI, and VGA allow you to connect to your dedicated graphics card and gaming console. The VX2467-mhd features all the perks needed to dominate all your gaming and entertainment quests.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VX2467-MHD It’s Not Magic. It’s ViewSonic Sharper Movies. Clearer Gaming.

Stunning Full HD Resolution Enjoy a premium viewing experience with stunning Full HD resolution. That’s 2X more pixels than standard HD resolution. Versatile Connectivity DisplayPort, HDMI and VGA inputs give you the freedom to connect your monitor to a variety of devices. Thin-Bezel Design Enjoy more room to see what matters most. A thin-bezel design provides a seamless viewing experience individually and in multi-monitor setups. MVA Panel Technology With MVA technology, this monitor delivers consistent, accurate images no matter which angle you’re looking at the screen. Dual Integrated Speakers With dual integrated speakers, this monitor combines incredible screen performance with immersive stereo sound for a delightful audiovisual experience.

Smooth & Fluid Gaming With VESA Adaptive-Sync connectivity, this AMD FreeSync monitor seamlessly synchronizes the frame rate output between your graphics card and monitor to easily eliminate image tearing. Rapid Response Time With a 1ms MPRT response time, this monitor delivers smooth images without streaking, blurring or ghosting. Built-in varying response rates automatically correct overshooting and motion blur. 75Hz Refresh Rate With a 75Hz refresh rate, this monitor delivers smooth frame loading and breathtaking graphics no matter how quickly the in-game action unfolds. Optimized View Settings Choose from “Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” and “Mono” presets with ViewMode. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast and brightness for an incredible viewing experience.

Previous page Eye Care Flicker-Free and Blue Light technology help reduce eye strain over extended periods. VESA Compatible Mount Easily install your monitor on a VESA-compatible wall mount or stand. Next page 1 Eye Care 2 VESA Compatible Mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I use these in combination with a docking station to set up generic 3 monitor work stations. So far I have set up at least 20 work stations. Meaning I have purchased and installed 60 of these monitors. Not one problem with any of them. For mixed office use they work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Horrible Button Placement
reviews.reviewText: While the monitor output for this model is decent, the location of the buttons on the back side in the middle was a really poor design choice. Turning on the monitor or accessing the OSD Menu to it set up is a real chore. What was wrong with them being on the bottom of the monitor?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Monitor for Apple Mini
reviews.reviewText: Overall good quality image and easy setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars USPS cannot keep up.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered thirty of these monitors. The monitors are fine; they're beautiful, exactly what we expected, and we have had no problems with them yet. The problem was that it took nine days to get them all because Amazon shipped them using USPS. The delivery date kept getting put off. I had frustrating calls to Support for help, and finally got a local USPS Supervisor on the phone. He told me they couldn't deliver on time because there was no room on the truck. Finally, over a two day period they were finally delivered. We have these issues often with USPS, and never with FedEx or UPS. Clearly USPS does not have the capacity to manage the additional load that Amazon has entrusted to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it a lot, but....
reviews.reviewText: This replaced a 22" Viewsonic that I have had for many years but is got fried by lightning strike. I like quality, setup is a bit challenging but do-able. Only thing I dislike is the tinny audio speakers. the old 22" where much better. I am using it on a Mac laptop OS.10.14.5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works very nice with my new Computer

So just received this product and got it all set up. Took a bit of playing around to get it set up to my needs and liking, but the picture quality is now excellent. I don't do any gaming so can't comment on that aspect of this monitor, but for viewing documents, surfing etc. it is very nice. Large bright clear screen which is much better than my old monitor. However, where this monitor really falls down is the sound quality. My 10 year old monitor with built in speakers is magnitudes better in sound quality. This monitor is virtually unusable for anything where sound is required. It sounds like a cheap transistor radio from the 1960s. While I didn't expect audiophile quality sound, I did expect it to be better than it is. If it had even the sound quality of my 10 year old monitor I would have given this monitor a 4, maybe 5 star rating. But as it is, the best I can give it is a 3. I have now had to order speakers as this thing will be virtually unusable without them. As far as I am concerned, if a company can't include a minimally usable feature on their product, don't even bother trying to include that feature. If I had known the speakers were this bad, I would have either looked elsewhere or just ordered separate speakers at the same time as ordering this monitor. If you are OK with vintage transistor radio sound then this would be a good buy. Otherwise, you might want to get a different monitor, or at a minimum get yourself some speakers. If you already have speakers or don't require sound, from only a viewing/visuals perspective this monitor is certainly well worth considering.

reviews.reviewTitle: No ability to adjust screen height or angle.
reviews.reviewText: Didn't even get to the point of even turning it on, you can't adjust this screen at all: it's very low, and angles inwards (down) by default, with no swivels, height adjustment or any way of tilting the screen. Returning now.
